public void SetGradient(View view) {
        GradientDrawable gd = new GradientDrawable(
                GradientDrawable.Orientation.TL_BR,
                new int[]{0xFF141a24, 0xFF293f49, 0xFF72554c});
        view.setBackground(gd);
    }
